ComicInfo.Summary:
SynopsisEDDIE NEALE is a P.O.W. Confined to a castle cell, escape seems impossible. However, under the very noses of his Nazi captors, Eddie and some new allies form a plan… Now all he has to do. To escape is… take a leap into the unknown!
PlotKommandant Von-Kleist is still trying to figure out who or what murdered Ernst, and he still believes Heinrich is lying about it being an undead Muggenthaler.
Eddie Neale and Gunter become closer, as they bound over European football, but Eddie is still planning on escaping the prison with sisters help.
Meanwhile two solider are looking for the Kommandant's dog, who seems to be lost in the woods. When they find it, the dog has become some kind of demon and kills one man and the other is forced to throw the dog in the frozen lake, where it is consumed by a lake monster.
Later when Eddie tries to escape he attempts to swim the lake but is caught by a patrol boat. The boat is then attacked by an undead Muggenthaler and a lake demon.
Note*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Max Millgate | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Max Millgate | 2 | Note: The digital edition (9/14/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
